definitions.definition: Mustela erminea , the ermine or short-tailed weasel , a mustelid native to Eurasia and North America , distinguished from the least weasel by its larger size and longer tail with a prominent black tip.

main_definition: Mustela erminea , the ermine or short-tailed weasel , a mustelid native to Eurasia and North America , distinguished from the least weasel by its larger size and longer tail with a prominent black tip.
